response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance the efficiency and profitability of your operations. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $10,000 to you. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you for $12,000. This price not only reflects its market value but also provides you with an opportunity to maximize your investment with a reasonable markup. I look forward to your consideration and the possibility of bringing this product to your business.", "product_price": 12000}
